name: Fish Stock
recipeIngredient: 1.5 kg bones and trimmings of white fish (cut into pieces),
8 white peppercorns (crushed and wrapped in a piece of muslin).
recipeInstructions: 1. Rinse the bones and trimmings then drain.
2. Melt the butter in a saucepan and sweat the vegetables over a low heat for a few minutes.
3. Add the fish bones and trimmings and bubble gently for a few seconds.
5. Cook until reduced to one third.
6. Add 2.5 l cold water, bring to the boil, then immediately reduce to a simmer.
8. Add the bouquet garni and lemon.
9. Simmer gently for 25 minutes, skimming when necessary.
10. 10 minutes before the end add the muslin wrapped peppercorns.
11. Strain the stock and cool as quickly as possible.
